Trample
Madness {4}{R}{W}{B} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
When Overcharged Gorger enters the battlefield, if its madness cost was paid, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample and haste until end of turn.
